qas.question: What did the government of Saint Helena fund in 2012?

answers.text: St. Helena Human Rights Action Plan 2012-2015

qas.question: What kind of articles were published to help this plan?
How was support for members of the public given?

context: In 2012, the government of St. Helena funded the creation of the <a0_0>St. Helena Human Rights Action Plan 2012-2015<a0_0/>. Work is being done under this action plan, including publishing <a1_0>awareness-raising articles<a1_0/> in local newspapers, providing support for members of the public <a2_0>with human rights queries<a2_0/>, and extending several UN Conventions on human rights to St. Helena.
